page.title: 01Life in Woodham Ferrers
page.content: The following extracts are taken from childrens' writings: "My life is all for sports, such as karate, swimming, football, rounders and cricket. My best friend is called Darren. He is 12. We go for walks over the fields, make camps in bushes, climb trees and ride our bikes. My brother Michael and I look after foreign birds. We have got four budgerigars, one zebra finch, one Californian quail, a cockateille and a pair of canaries. My Mum has her own company called Matrix Communications. My Dad works at a bank. Soon my Dad will leave his job and work with my Mum. My favourite school work is maths, games, country dancing and PE. In 12 years time I am hoping to be a solicitor. In my spare time I want to be an astronomer. On my birthday I want a big telescope."
